module.sql: ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_templates` DROP `script`, DROP `scripts`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_templates` CHANGE `modifiedAt` `modifiedAt` DECIMAL(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletters` ADD `senderAddress` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `status`, ADD `senderName` VARCHAR(100) NULL AFTER `title`;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_templates` ADD `imprint` TEXT NULL AFTER `styles`;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_reader_letters` ADD `mailId` INT( 11 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `newsletterId`, ADD INDEX ( `mailId` );

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_templates` ADD `version` VARCHAR( 10 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `themeId`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>newsletter_templates` ADD `authorName` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `imprint`, ADD `authorEmail` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `authorName`, ADD `authorUrl` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `authorEmail`, ADD `authorCompany` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `authorUrl`, ADD `license` VARCHAR( 20 ) NULL AFTER `authorCompany`, ADD `licenseUrl` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `license`, ADD `description` TEXT NULL AFTER `licenseUrl`;
